silex_client.network.websocket module¶

@author: TD gang

Class definition that connect the the given url throught websockets, receive and handle the incomming messages

class silex_client.network.websocket.WebsocketConnection(url: Optional[str] = None)¶

Bases: object

Websocket client that connect the the given url and receive and handle the incomming messages

Variables

  • EVENT_LOOP_TIMEOUT – How long in second to wait between each update loop

  • THREAD_TEARDOWN_TIMEOUT – How to wait for the thread to join before concidering it an error

EVENT_LOOP_TIMEOUT = 0.2¶
THREAD_TEARDOWN_TIMEOUT = 5¶
static parameters_to_url(base_url: str, parameters: Dict[str, str]) → str¶

Convert a dictionary of parameters to an url

run() → None¶

Initialize the event loop’s task and run it in main thread

run_multithreaded()¶

Initialize the event loop’s task and run it in a different thread

send(message: Union[str, List[str]]) → None¶

Add the given message to the list of pending message to be sent

stop() → None¶

Ask to all the event loop’s tasks to stop and join the thread to the main thread if there is one running

static url_to_parameters(url: str) → Dict[str, str]¶

Convert an url into a dict of key/value for all the parameters of the url
